column1:
Overall sentiment percentages for each aspect:
Cleaniness: 57.34%
Amenities: 61.54%
Location: 57.39%
Services: 60.90%
General: 61.27%
Value: 58.86%

Suggestions for improvement based on the dataframe:
Cleaniness: Invest in regular maintenance and sanitation of the facilities to improve overall cleanliness.
Amenities: Increase the variety of amenities, such as providing more comfortable seating, better food options, and updated technology and entertainment options.
Location: Ensure the location is convenient, easily accessible, and well-connected to public transportation.
Services: Improve employee training and customer service to ensure that all customer needs are met quickly and efficiently.
General: Focus on creating a pleasant environment that appeals to a wide variety of customers. Invest in decor, lighting, and music to create a pleasant atmosphere.
Value: Offer discounts or promotions to encourage customers to visit more frequently and provide a greater value for their money.
